sentences.sContent: I opened the packet just to satisfy my curiosity .
sentences.sCn: 我打开包裹只是为了满足我的好奇心。

sentences.sContent: The news aroused a lot of curiosity among local people.
sentences.sCn: 这条消息在当地人中间引起了很大的好奇心。

sentences.sContent: She decided to follow him out of curiosity .
sentences.sCn: 她出于好奇决定跟踪他。

sentences.sContent: Margaret looked at him with curiosity .
sentences.sCn: 玛格丽特好奇地看着他。

sentences.sContent: a man of immense intellectual curiosity
sentences.sCn: 求知欲极强的一个男人

sentences.sContent: It was idle curiosity that made me ask.
sentences.sCn: 我只是好奇地随便问了一下。
